snippet: The victory of Luis Guillermo Solís, a history professor, who sought to win one million votes in the presidential election, seemed likely on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: The victory of Luis Guillermo Solís, a history professor, who sought to win one million votes in the presidential election, seemed likely on Sunday.

headline.main: Costa Rica Set for Lopsided Victory
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Set for Lopsided Victory
